'''Ponto Baggins II'''<ref name=letter>{{L|214}}</ref> was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].<ref name=baggins>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

== History ==
Ponto was the eldest son of [[Posco Baggins]] and [[Gilly Brownlock]] and was named after his great-grandfather, [[Ponto Baggins|Ponto]]. He was the father of [[Angelica Baggins|Angelica]] and they attended the [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Birthday Party]] together.<ref name=baggins/>

After [[Frodo Baggins]] left [[the Shire]] in {{SR|1422}}, Ponto "presumably" became the head of the [[Baggins Family]], though in title only, as [[Bag End]] had passed to [[Samwise Gamgee]].<ref name=letter/>
